explains: v. 使商业化；使商品化

sentences.en: They are also cooperating with science and technology parks in different places, so as to commercialize their fruits of innovation.
sentences.cn: 它们还与各地的科技园合作，将创新成果商业化。

sentences.en: It's working with two major solar manufacturers, JA Solar and Yingl, to commercialize the technology.
sentences.cn: 它正在与两家主要的太阳能制造商——晶澳太阳能和英利公司合作，打算将这项技术商业化。

sentences.en: It isn't wise to commercialize sport.
sentences.cn: 把体育运动商业化并不明智。
